name: objectionably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is unpleasant or wrong: If you continue to behave so objectionably, I'm going to go home. It only took a couple of drinks for him to become objectionably drunk.
More examplesFewer examplesThe article is an objectionably one-sided view of a very complex and difficult situation.She would objectionably dismiss any suggestion that a different approach could be taken.It's rubbish, or to put it rather less objectionably, there is potential for improvement.
